description: Top-of-mountain performance comes to the streets with the Men's WarmCube™ McCarren Jacket. Innovative 3D WarmCube construction prevents the 800-fill-power down from being displaced, plus traps heat in the surrounding channels for maximum warmth. The waterproof, breathable 2-layer GORE-TEX® fabric keeps you dry in unexpected rainstorms, plus 100% seam taping offers complete leakproof protection. Adjust the hood for extra coverage and zip it off when you don't need it. The two-way zipper with a storm flap won’t bunch as you're seated on the train, while articulated elbows increase mobility. Stow essentials in this winter coat's zippered interior chest or handwarmer pockets.
name: Marmot Warmcube McCarren Jacket - Mens
